geography.terrain: Sandy ruins with buried buildings and dead trees

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive at Erumalu Ruins
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates arrive at the abandoned ruins of Erumalu and witness the devastating effects of the drought.
keyEvents.significance: First direct evidence of Arabasta's crisis, motivating the crew to help Vivi

keyEvents.title: Erumalu's History Explained
keyEvents.description: Vivi explains how Erumalu went from a thriving green city to abandoned desert ruins over three years.
keyEvents.significance: Provides crucial context for understanding the Arabasta conflict

statusHistory.description: Erumalu was known as the 'Green City' due to its abundant plant life sustained by the Sandora River
The Sandora River began losing force and seawater infiltrated, making water unsuitable for consumption or agriculture
After three years without rain, the city was completely abandoned. Only half-buried ruins remain

culturalSignificance: The Great Taph Temple was completed here 3,835 years ago, making it one of Arabasta's most historically significant locations. The city's fall symbolizes the devastating impact of the drought.

reveals.information: Erumalu is now completely abandoned with only ruins remaining
Was called the 'Green City' before the drought destroyed it over three years
Contains the Great Taph Temple/Cathedral, built 3,835 years ago

geography.terrain: Sandy shore with access to the sea
notableFeatures: Shore where ships can anchor near Erumalu

keyEvents.title: Kung Fu Dugongs Encounter
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats encounter Kung Fu Dugongs for the first time at this coastal location.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of memorable creatures and comedic sequence

keyEvents.title: Luffy Defeats Kung Fu Dugong
keyEvents.description: Luffy defeats a Kung Fu Dugong at the coast, making them his disciples.

statusHistory.description: Coastal area inhabited by Kung Fu Dugongs

culturalSignificance: Home to the Kung Fu Dugongs, a unique species that practices martial arts and follows a strict honor code.

reveals.information: The Arabasta coast is home to Kung Fu Dugongs

notableFeatures: Suffering from reduced flow and seawater infiltration

keyEvents.title: Ace Travels with Straw Hats on the River
keyEvents.description: The crew travels along the Sandora River with Ace temporarily joining them.
keyEvents.significance: Setting for Ace's revelation about hunting Blackbeard

keyEvents.title: Sandora River's Degradation Explained
keyEvents.description: Vivi explains that the Sandora River has been losing force, with seawater from the Grand Line infiltrating and making the water unusable.
keyEvents.significance: Explains one of the natural factors contributing to Arabasta's crisis

statusHistory.description: Once a strong river providing reliable water to cities like Erumalu
River has lost much of its force, with seawater infiltration making water unsuitable for consumption or agriculture

culturalSignificance: Major water source for Arabasta, its degradation contributed significantly to the abandonment of Erumalu and other cities.

reveals.information: The Sandora River has been contaminated by seawater infiltration from the Grand Line

geography.terrain: Royal palace in the capital city

keyEvents.title: King Cobra Opens Palace to Citizens
keyEvents.description: King Cobra personally invites all citizens who want to speak with him to enter the palace, showing his compassion and openness.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Cobra's true character and innocence regarding the Dance Powder accusations

keyEvents.title: Alubarna and the 'King's Miracle'
keyEvents.description: Referenced as the location where Dance Powder allegedly caused rain, leading people to believe in the 'King's Miracle' while the rest of the country suffered.
keyEvents.significance: Central location in Crocodile's propaganda campaign against King Cobra

statusHistory.description: Seat of royal power in Arabasta, currently under scrutiny due to Dance Powder allegations

culturalSignificance: The royal palace of Arabasta and seat of the Nefertari family's power. Central to the political crisis due to allegations of Dance Powder use.

reveals.information: King Cobra maintains an open-door policy despite the crisis, personally meeting with citizens
